text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4a44120e3dc1d40dd7109658afd5e078360b1d8f|patch 8.2.2062: <Cmd> does not handle CTRL-V>
patch 8.2.2062:  does not handle CTRL-V

Problem:     does not handle CTRL-V.
Solution:   Call get_literal() after encountering CTRL-V. (closes #7387)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2062:  does not handle CTRL-V · vim/vim@4a44120
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2062:  does not handle CTRL-V · vim/vim@4a44120

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4d05af0a64c2e26b13d2ad571debbf5f3b6d384e|patch 8.2.2061: Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_se…>
patch 8.2.2061: Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_sendkeys()

Problem:    Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_sendkeys().
Solution:   Don't check for an invalid type unless the terminal can't be
            found. (closes #7382)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2061: Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_se… · vim/vim@4d05af0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2061: Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_se… · vim/vim@4d05af0
attachments.text: …ndkeys() Problem: Vim9: E1030 error when using empty string for term_sendkeys(). Solution: Don't check for an invalid type unless the terminal can't be found. (closes #7382)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/aeb313f355cd67638e3c611354ce401d86f56afe|patch 8.2.2060: check for features implemented with "if">
patch 8.2.2060: check for features implemented with "if"

Problem:    Check for features implemented with "if".
Solution:   Use the Check commands. (Ken Takata, closes #7383)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2060: check for features implemented with "if" · vim/vim@aeb313f
attachments.text: Problem: Check for features implemented with "if". Solution: Use the Check commands. (Ken Takata, closes #7383)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6ee874d378829b62e0944063a9a029e81b5debfb|patch 8.2.2059: Amiga: can't find plugins>
patch 8.2.2059: Amiga: can't find plugins

Problem:    Amiga: can't find plugins.
Solution:   Do not use "**" in the pattern. (Ola Söder, closes #7384)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2059: Amiga: can't find plugins · vim/vim@6ee874d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2059: Amiga: can't find plugins · vim/vim@6ee874d
attachments.text: Problem: Amiga: can't find plugins. Solution: Do not use "**" in the pattern. (Ola Söder, closes #7384)
